lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura will be joining us shortly. She's finishing baby stuff in the other room. But in the meantime, we're here to get through our announcements for the evening. First and foremost, we have our fantastic friends and glorious sponsor through campaign two thus far, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: D&D Beyond!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wish them a happy birthday on their Facebook and Twitter pages.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Happy birthday.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the whole announcement, but I recently went to Virginia, so I got inspired to write a country song for D&D Beyond.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that what that hat is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That hat has puka shells on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got my character sheet and my daddy's dice, because Exandria's where it's at. D&D Beyond, be my girl tonight. Roll me close, crit me tight. I got a pickup, a 12-gauge, an American flag, but it's you that makes me feel all right. D&D Beyond--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) D&D Beyond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Be my girl tonight. There's another verse! I've trucked across the heartland, from Dallas to Memphis and back. But Emon's the place I miss the most, where I want to hang my hat. So, darling, call the Piggly Wiggly, and tell them you're gonna be late. Turn off your phone because your cowboy's home. Get ready for an all-night date. D&D Beyond, be my girl tonight. Roll me close, crit me tight. I got some illegal fireworks, a smokehouse, a new tractor, a hunting dog, my mama's Bible, some Frito pie, NASCAR tickets, a deer license, some new tires, a handle of Southern Comfort, but it's you that makes me feel all right. D&D Beyond, be my girl tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw, thank you, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those are all official Southern things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not sure if we'll animate that one, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give it time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If we've taken anything from that, we now have the mental image of a country Sam enjoying an all-night date with his D&D Beyond.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You and your computer, all night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, D&D Beyond, for your sponsorship and allowing such magical moments like this to happen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "What are you doing in there, Sam?" "I'm just looking at my spells!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We also have, for those who haven't seen it yet or haven't had the opportunity, Marisha's Honey Heist 2: Electric Beargaloo VOD is available on YouTube at youtube.com/criticalrole, so you can go check it out there for free any time you want! It's there, it's ready to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Crackheads.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was nuts. It was so much fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were pretty loopy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic, beary awesome portrait art by Joana Carvalho, who did a great job with it. You can check it out at shop.critrole.com.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who was touching my dice? Why were they out already when I got here? Samuel, what did you do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I may have helped set up for you, being a caring parent. Don't worry, though, I only touched the ones that you wouldn't have used anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Speaking of which, Laura, how's that merch coming?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, we got those Electric Beargaloo shirts! You guys, did you know we have a bunch of new items in our shop?

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a retro tee. There's a Mighty Nein Tee. That one has been altered by Marisha Ray, but you can alter your own at home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sleeves are bullshit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. We've got-- we don't have that one in store right now. But we have our other shirts. The Nott Detective Agency, case closed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got one job.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have hats that are sold out that'll be back some time. Pins.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone loved the dad hats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The dad hats are awesome!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why are they dad hats?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, they're called dad hat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I wore my dad hat and it looks great on a girl, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was wearing it today when I was working.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's metallic thread. That'll be back. I like how we're advertising our hat that's not in stock right now, but there's other things. Go check it out at our shop: shop.critrole.com. I know that address by heart!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Laura. Welcome back to the table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Polished, professional.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like riding a bike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Someday I'll get to Sam Riegel levels.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) D&D Beyond--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. Well done, Laura. Welcome back. Last we left off, our band of adventurers, The Mighty Nein, having trekked away from Zadash northward on two different jobs for The Gentleman, had accomplished both of these contracted jobs for him. Losing a friend, gaining a friend, made their way back south. Oh my god! Motherfucker! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, that's been a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa. Marisha, look! It's your husband.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everything you do, have done, or will do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, so good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god. Doogie Howser, eat your fucking heart out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know that part in the game where you don't understand why you got so many points into renegade as opposed to paragon? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now available in the merch store!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm not going to be able to run the game tonight. I can't focus. Take two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Neither can the fans, steamy Dr. Mercer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I will never live that down. It's great when you're a new actor in LA and everyone says, "Yeah, you got to get some head shots, and I know all about it. You got to get those costume and "character shots in."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that what it was? Yes! Oh, I love it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When you show up, right off the truck, you don't know what you're doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you need some archetypes. Come with a doctor outfit, come with a regular business suit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To be fair, I got a few gigs that way, by doing a few character shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've done a lot of doctors. No, all that photo has done is this. That is literally the most it's ever done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're like 17 and a half here, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would have been about ten years ago.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So early 30s?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. We'll go with that one. Anyway, back to the story at hand! Upon completing your journey, checking in with The Gentleman, you were paid the ripe sum that you had discussed. After taking your newfound friend from Shadycreek Run, Ophelia, back to The Evening Nip, you exited with your new gold and platinum in hand. After a celebratory drink to the memory of Molly, you grabbed Caduceus and led him into the city of Zadash-- the largest city you've ever seen by leaps and bounds-- to see what kind of ways you can corrupt this new, fresh mind, free out of the Savalierwood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so exciting!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is where we left off. In this case, guys, we have roughly two weeks of downtime. I'm going to go around and ask what you would like to accomplish, and if moments require rolls, moments require roleplay, anything like that, we'll jump into it. I would like to say, who wants to go first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god. One two three, not it!

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Not it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Liam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't say not it. Would you like to go, Liam?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Come on, Piggly Wiggly!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Not much. Okay, the things I wrote down were: I would like to use my money.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your money!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To buy a bunch of baubles and trinkets and buttons and ribbons and string and beads and one crescent ornament.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I will say you could purchase all of those things-- and you're buying these yourself?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In Disguise Self mode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. I'd say you could buy all of those things with, let's say, a single gold, because your charisma isn't that high. A single gold piece for all of that. That's priced up a bit.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: That's pretty good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will put all of that stuff into a package and mail it away with a note that I sent you earlier, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, I have that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, step two! I'm going to take my gun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I stole a gun. You weren't there for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They weren't there for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I stole a gun!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got a gat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I stole a gun from a guard. I've got one bullet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, like one round, single shot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! Don't fuck with me, man! I will blow you away, motherfucker!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit! Okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless I miss, and then it's nothing. No, I would like to take apart the gun. I'd like to take apart the gun and figure out how the hammer works, how the gunpowder ignites. Is it a pack of powder like a bullet, or is it loose powder with a ball?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, first off, do you have or own tinkerer's tools?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but do any of you guys?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tinkerer's tools. I'll go and buy them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This next expense will be 50 gold pieces for the set of tinkerer's tools.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would need you to make a tinkering check to see if you can successfully disassemble the gun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does anyone want to help me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Without ruining elements of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think any of us have enough experience to help you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb would help.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have tinkering experience?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, but I'm pretty smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Add your intelligence modifier to see if you can figure out the safest way to do so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled a 14 and I have an intelligence of plus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes you a little bit of time, but you manage to very carefully disassemble the entirety of the pistol without any issues.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm specifically curious about how the impact of the hammer creates an explosion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through the words of the man responsible for inventing these things naught but 20-plus years beforehand, if you would like to explain?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my goodness!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is a flash pan where there's a preload powder, basically a powder capsule attaches to a flash pan. The hammer contains a sparking mechanism that hits a plate, causes a spark to hit the powder in the flash pan, goes into the gunpowder that's within that's actually packed inside of the barrel and sends the shot out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a specific kind of metal that makes a spark?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It actually is a specific kind. It's a flint.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a flint metal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Although, people have probably gotten creative with that at that time, but the Percy tech was just a flint. He was trying to do other stuff and always failed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With that knowledge, I will purchase any other materials I will need to do this. I'm going to take out the 20 arrows I grabbed from the Iron Shepherds' house. I'm going to try to modify them, using multiple arrowheads if needed, to make an explosive arrowhead that's packed with some gunpowder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would be a bag at the front with a flint that would spark on pressure. So as long as you fired it hard, it would cause the spark when it hit and detonate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a tinker check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Another tinkerer's check! I'm not a good tinkerer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, look at your dice!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 11 plus three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where did you get those?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got them for free from somebody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those are so pretty!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're from Norse Foundry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From Norse Foundry. Just a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it'll cost you an additional 20 gold in materials, because you fail multiple times going through, and end up wasting a lot of materials until, eventually, you get it right and you're certain that this would be the one that would function properly. So you have one explosive arrow. You're not entirely certain what it does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One explosive arrow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Welcome to tinkering, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take the parts of the gun-- it's apart now, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're separate individual pieces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't put it back together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll try. That's a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reassemble it. It looks to be functional.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, and I will look at it and say: Whoever invented this was a very smart person. She must have been a very, very smart person indeed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, she was.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. I'd also like to purchase a pair of gloves or have them made.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For show or comfort?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For comfort and show, human skin color, with little fingernails embroidered at the end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right, so you have this commissioned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it is a commission and it is specific, it'd probably be at the similar store to where Beau got her reversible cloak made earlier in the campaign. It would only take maybe two days to get the materials together to match the color you wanted, and then the embroidery, and finishing the gloves for your size specifically. Since you'd be a smaller frame. All in all, I'd say five gold pieces. Which is pricey for a set of custom gloves, but not based on the money you had made.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, also, with that package I sent earlier, I also included 100 gold pieces in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so mark that off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then one last thing. I'd like to approach Jester, and ask her: Jester!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need your help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you need help with?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are a talented artiste.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I am very talented.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But also, you've mentioned in the past that you are an expert forger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I am! Have you seen my work? Remember?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've seen you draw dicks on things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, also I've written a lot of letters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't really show us those too much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're really good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If there were an art school or something, you should send it in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, thank you. I did have really good tutors when I was growing up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I bet. I'd like you to help me forge a letter. I'd like it to sound like it's from some sort of legal entity or law firm or court or something like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh. I'll use something like Esquire or something in there, that sounds very--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, yes, yes. And I'd like to-- oh, could you not tell Caleb about this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Secrets?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a secret.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm really good at keeping secrets. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd like it to read something like-- Oh! I'm going to be sending it to the Solstryce Academy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) I know about that! That's where Fjord wants to go. Are we writing this for Fjord?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's in Rexxentrum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Solstryce, yes, I know where it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Soltryce.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Soltryce Academy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Soul Train Academy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a good way to remember it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something like: "Greetings. Hello. To whom it may concern."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To whom it may concern.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I am trying to reach a young lady named Astrid, no last name given, who was a--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. Do I say that? No last name given?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. "Who was a student about 11 years ago at your academy. She has inherited a bit of money "from a distant relative: her uncle, Leonard Highfin. He's from--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Leonard Hyphen? Hyphen what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't-- Leonard Hyphen Leonard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Leonard Hyphen Leonard. Got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "From the town of Nigeria."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "And his estate has employed me to find her in order to deliver the funds."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Vast sums of money. Right. The funds, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Please reach out to her-- reach out to me--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. Now I've got to write it again because you said it wrong. Hold on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry. I didn't know you were writing it as I was saying. "Please reach out to me with her last "known contact information or address. You can write me in care of The Pillow Trove Hotel, "Zadash. Attention--" I don't know. Attention what? Mrs. Jester? Mrs. Dr. Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Mrs. Lavorre, Esquire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mrs. Lavorre, Esquire. "My legal practice thanks you in advance. Thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The legal practice of Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nott and Brave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott and Brave Law Firm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, Nott and Brave Law Firm. Okay. And then what now? Do you have a seal or something? Because it would be sealed really fancy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. On official letters, do you kiss them with lipstick? Do you put a little perfume on it? What do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? I have my mom's lavender oil. Hold on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That'll make it even more official.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Things that are from really fancy places, they always have--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm going to get it on my fingers and handle the paper. So the paper smells like it was handled by someone rich.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've noticed sometimes in letters that I've stolen from the post, fancy ones anyway, sometimes you pull out the letter and then there's this other piece of tissue paper in there for no reason.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. We'll do something like that. I use another piece of paper because I don't have any kind of tissue paper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a blank one. All right, and then we mail it to the Soltryce Academy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, wait! We need a really fancy seal. We need wax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have any wax?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet Caleb has wax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't tell him about this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Do you know where any candles are?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's candles everywhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we'll stamp it with a ring! One of my rings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, perfect!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got a rose on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Two things. One, I would like you to roll for your forgery.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a bunch of candle wax. White wax.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plain beeswax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you proficient with your forgery kit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I have a forgery kit. How do I know if I'm proficient? Hold on. I think I am because of my background. Yes. No. Yes. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think you should, depending on your--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on. I'm opening my-- yeah! Proficiencies and languages. Forgery kit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Go ahead and roll a d20. Add your intelligence modifier and your proficiency bonus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why intelligence? Can it be the wisdom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, no. Let's make it dexterity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Plus what? My proficiency?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Proficiency bonus and your intelligence modifier. Dex, I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 12 plus three, is 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to forge the letter in what you believe to be a fairly decent forgery.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A really good forgery.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It looks like it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not matching somebody's handwriting, per se. It's more about getting an officious look to it, with little flourishes of calligraphy at the beginning of sentences.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a big first letter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. I would like you to roll a general dexterity check for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dexterity check? Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There's a difference between sealing wax and candle wax. How do I know this? Because I've made that mistake before, sealing letters for previous D&D campaigns. You manage to press your ring into the wax and pull back, and now there's mush on the end of your ring, and there's a circular piece of mushed soft wax where the seal should be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is pretty shitty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need sealing wax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need actual sealing wax. I peel it up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you go get some from the stiggity store?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I'll go to the store and buy some sealing wax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sealing wax, it's not too expensive. We'll say two silver to get you a chunk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two silver for this wax! You better be really grateful!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll pay for postage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Now I can send letters to my mom with a really cool seal!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! So you did need it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. You finish the letter. You seal it best to your ability. You hope it seems official enough, and you send it off towards its destination in Rexxentrum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Boop!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that this is someone from his past who might be able to, you know, make him think of happier times.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who? Astrid?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) That's the name he said to me when we were dancing. Did you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we were dancing. We were waltzing. It was really lovely. He was very drunk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I remember that night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then he said something about Astrid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He misses her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it his girlfriend?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think so. You know, I don't know which way he swings, but he could really get any girl he wanted to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's nice. Well, I hope it works.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: End scene.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End scene, all right. Is that the extent of the things you want to accomplish, Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All righty, who wants to step up next?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was the second-to-last to say--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, so Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, I have some things that I want to accomplish on my own and then I also need to have a conversation with Beauregard, but before that I need to go shopping. I have a list of things I want to do, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (deadpan) Wait, let me come along.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to go shopping? Travis, are you sure?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you going to Pumat's?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me come along if you're going shopping.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja. Oh, what are you in the market for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I figure if we're going to be traveling together, we should probably have some supplies. I'm looking for some diamonds for some things I know how to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, well we have some fellows you could meet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, let's all go shopping!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We just got money!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a lot of money.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm coming.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go shopping.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the four of you, Jester, Caduceus, Caleb, and Beauregard, are going shopping.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right. Well, what are you guys looking for?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Catch y'all on the flip.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go see that beautiful baby, Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Going on a trip.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to go to Pumat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The smells of fresh baked goods, cooking stews, and various other treats and snacks that are being presented as part of the shopping experience catch your nostrils as you move through. You hear music playing in the distance. For all the chaos that life has thrown you in the past 30 days, it feels nice to step into a place that's so filled with life and lack of understanding of how dark the world is at the fringes of this empire, both with the war going on and some of the things you've encountered. It's nice to step into this space and you catch yourself instinctually smiling and finding it infectious to brighten your mood. You turn to see the darkened green wood with gold accoutrements that marks the exterior of The Invulnerable Vagrant. The front door is closed, but appears to be not locked for any particular reason.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have such a clear picture in my head, now that we've built it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a little larger in-world than the one that we did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But the aesthetic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Across the way, sitting behind the desk, face down in a book, one of the various Pumats, who looks up and, "Oh, why hello there! Yeah, oh, it's been a while. Sorry, took me a second to recognize "you. You're very silhouetted by the bright sunshine outside you right now and it's a bit dark "interior, so come on up!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We do always seem to come around 4:00pm, right when the sun is coming in the window.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another Pumat comes around the corner and goes, "Oh, do we have folks in here?" "Yeah, don't "worry, Pumat, I got them taken care of. Oh, there's even more coming in."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Cool, twins. Right. That's cool. I like this place. This is nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pumat III, this is Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Caduceus! Why, it's a pleasure to meet you as well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a pleasure to meet you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't see many of our kind wandering around these large establishments."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're the first one I've seen in the city so far. That's pretty crazy. This is nice. Is this yours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it's ours. Well, it's his. Hey, Prime! You might want to step out of the workshop "for a second." You hear some rustling and grumbling in the background, and the curtain opens and you see a third one of them step out, goggles affixed to the head, a little bit of smudges of dirt on the edges of the chin. "What are you talking about? Oh my goodness."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're all brothers, then? There's three of you now. Triplets. That's great. That's great! Don't see that very often.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where are you from? To be perfectly honest, we haven't really run into any other firbolgs "really since we came here."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, me neither. I'm actually from up north. I'm traveling with these kids, working on something. It's nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wow."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long have you been down here? This place is great. This is great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, thank you." At this point, the fourth one comes down from a ladder off on the right side chamber. "Oh, is the order getting-- Oh, it's a whole party over here! Is that another firbolg?" Comes down and the other's like, "Yeah, there's one over here." The other Pumat's like, "I'm "impressed. I like the color tones. It's a great arrangement, visual perspective."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Impressed by what your mother went through, at this point. This is intense. There's a lot of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one with the goggles in the back goes, "Sorry about that. I should clarify. These three "are arcane-based copies of myself. We are all collectively Pumat, but I am the original."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's the best thing I've ever seen. That's crazy. That's just great. I'd love to learn how to do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You shouldn't call them "arcane copies." They have their own personalities and their own self. You should appreciate them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the other ones speaks up and goes, "We absolutely take no offense, because it's true."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, all right, but I think each and every one of you is unique in your own way and you should really appreciate it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The three simulacrum all go, "Aww" at the same time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go back to rearranging the shelf.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's nice to see another firbolg out in the world doing something, and you seem like you're really building something great here. This is spectacular.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I greatly appreciate that. We put a lot of hard work into it and it's hard to come "across folks like us that would appreciate something on this scale."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You might know. Is there anything I absolutely should see while I'm in town? This is the farthest I've been from home. I'm curious if there's anything in this city that a firbolg out taking a look around should--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, unless I am mistaken, from my previous memory of times outside of Zadash, when's "the last time you had a good bath?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I had a hot spring, which was nice. I mean, it had some sulfur content and there were some minerals in there that were probably a bit iffy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The baths here are quite lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Listen to him. Follow that around."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are we talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, sorry. Did you come here to do business?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Prime goes, "All right, then. Nice to meet you--?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Caduceus Clay. Pleasure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Caduceus Clay. Pumat Sol. Pleasure."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Look forward to doing business with yous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, you got gold, we've got things to purchase. Anyway, other Pumats, take care of "these folks. I've got to get back to work. Good to see you all again."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bye, Prime.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He exits to the back room. The two other Pumats step back and watch, and they're both looking at you with this kind of--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He seems like a decent boss. That seems nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not too bad. People say you want to be your own boss, well--" (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's really good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It feels weird to interrupt whatever this is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm hungry, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unfortunately, we don't really sell much in the realm of food items."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am in the market for some things of arcane nature. Oh, I see you're reading a book. What are you reading?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh, god, no more small talk! You still have those bracers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We do, actually. To be perfectly honest, you mostly cleaned us out last time you were in "here, but we've got a few more items in here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what's up with those bracers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We got the bracers here, if that's what you're looking for."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have they come down in price?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They've been sitting on a shelf for six weeks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And six weeks later, you're coming in and asking about them still."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He does have a point there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know what, Jester?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But yeah, price is still 1200 gold pieces."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. What do they do again? Can you explain one more time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "These bracers, enchanted by our fantastic boss, Pumat Sol, allow the bearer, as long as "they're not wearing any physical armor to impede the enchantment and/or a shield on their body, "helps protect them by deflecting incoming blows and giving them a better sense of avoiding "physical atrocity onto their person."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like they were specially made for you, Beau. You have to buy them. I think you should charge her more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Whose side are you on, here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like you're a very specialized sort of buyer, is all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, so if anything, he should give me a bargain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you should give her a deal!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How about we meet in the middle and we stick with the price provided?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seems fair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You threw him off, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry. I got confused.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Terrible wingwoman.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, we might be purchasing a few things, so why don't we wait and see what all ends up on the counter and then we'll come back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, we'll put this here waiting for you right there."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I look at it? Can I touch it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah." You can look at it, but you don't own it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Herr Pumat, I am considering spending about a thousand gold here and I'd be more likely to do so if maybe you could give us a better price for these things here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That can be considered, depending on how much of a purchase you're looking to make. What "are you looking for?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I need-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't think I've forgotten that silly string.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need quite a bit of your finest paper and ink. I have a dearth of scroll-- a dearth. A mighty dearth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Girth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a different conversation, danke. I need about roughly 500 or 600 gold's worth of your finest paper and ink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, save 300 gold because we need diamonds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm going to be buying some diamonds. I wouldn't worry about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If that's the case, if you don't mind waiting, Pumat III, could you go to our storage "facility and get some more of that wizard paper and ink? It looks like he's buying out our stock "here at the moment." "Yeah, not a worry. I'll be back here in the better part of 30 or 40 minutes, "if you don't mind being patient." That one Pumat takes a little cloak and throws it over his shoulders. "See you guys in a little bit!" And exits outside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's still one left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's three in the room left behind. One of them had drifted off to the side for a bit, but seems to be still listening in. So you still have the one that's dealing with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I also need incense. Fine incense. About 60 gold worth, if you have that much on hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can probably provide about 20 gold worth of "incense. But there are incense makers within Zadash that I'm sure can probably help you out "with the rest of it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So just not here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I remember you asking him for incense before from him, I think.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I used it. It's all gone. Just like my cat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can definitely look to ordering more incense if you foresee this being a consistent "thing. We normally don't get that much of a request for it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If, you know, the exchange rate is good. I don't need more than the 20 gold's worth of incense today, if you can order more. We're going to stay put for a little while, ja?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the turnaround-- what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll ask you later. Also-- oh dear. I need that, and I need that. Oh, yes, I was hoping to look through your selection of spells you have yourself. Nothing too majestic, but I have a short list.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Feel free to ask and I'll go ahead--" and he grabs this small wood front, wood back, with leather edging binding ledger or catalog that he pulls out and opens it up, "Yeah, let me know what "you're looking for. I'll tell you if we got one in stock."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you could flip to the transmutation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes a little set of glasses and puts them on the edge of his nose. "All right."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm looking for one that can help if your friends are falling and you don't want them to fall so hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Feather Fall. We got that, sure."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I get hurt very easily and I need something to help me get out of Dodge a little bit quicker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, there's a few options there. For lower level enchantments, we got an Expeditious "Retreat spell. That'll help get you out of the thick of things."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a winner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, that's putting that down as well as a possibility. Those prices here, because "they're both relatively simple spells, so I'll put them at about 100 gold apiece. That's 200 gold "total for those two spells."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And do you have something that can, say, catapult things around the room?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can do that for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, me too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I also want to be able to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, well, here. Let's see. In the realm of what you're looking to accomplish here--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pick up something and throw it across the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not paying for that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's some Odyssey of the Mind stuff, right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree with Jester here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you're going directly, not messing around, just a straight Catapult."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so 1994 of you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Straight up catapult?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja. Straight Up Catapult, is that what it's called? I'll take that as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to sell him a tiny catapult that he has to assemble himself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a straight up catapult. "Catapult, yeah, we do have that as well. That is 300 gold "for the batch of three. Any more spells you're inquiring about?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. There are so many, but I am of a limited budget. I'll think about it if you can help my friend Beauregard with a good price on those.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I also might want to buy weapons, if you have a weapon that is also really cool and stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a broken longsword. It's got a silver hilt and a silver pommel wrapped in red leathers around the handle, and there is a very fine filigree across the hilt and around the base, this silver loop on the bottom of the pommel. But it's a broken sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we going to get it fixed? Or can I still stab people with the broken part?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've got about an inch of blade there and it looks like it's still sharp in places. If you "get real close you can probably make someone have a really bad day."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, looking it over, it looks like there was some sort of enchantment embedded in it, but "since the blade has been broken, there's not-- it looks to be very old. Looks like it probably was a "relic from pre--" He goes and looks at his notes real fast. "Yeah, this would be pre-Divergence, "from the Age of Arcanum. The reason we took it is the historical significance. We could probably "fetch a pretty penny should we take it to the various lyceums. The Academy would probably be "real interested. But if you want to take it off for sentimental value or go get it repaired some "time, it's 300 gold."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I mean, I'll look at it. I don't know. It's pretty broken-looking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (strained) Buy it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Prime finished up some of this dust here," and he pulls out a small sack that looks to be a red-brown dust. He says, "He's proud of this one, I'm going to be real honest with you. If it's "sprinkled over any edible substance, it greatly improves the flavor. To the point where it's "downright distracting. It's the Dust of Deliciousness."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my goodness!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's so exciting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a very exciting thing. Oh, that's expensive. Seems like something you could hold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Last thing we've got here, and then we're pretty much out at the moment. You guys have "become our number one customers, which is really appreciated. Just finished this cloak last week "here." He steps around the edge and you can see, while as well decorated as the place is, it's pretty bare now. You guys have come through and grabbed the necessary bits and what else was in there has been picked up as well. You guys aren't the only people who shop here, but you've been the most recent, intense customers. He pulls this fine bluish, purple-tint cloak material, that as it flows, as he lifts it up from behind the small locked box, it ever so faintly gives off this shimmer. "This is designed to obfuscate the movements of the person who wears it, to where it "makes him a little more difficult to pay attention. The enchantments here," and he looks back, and you can see it, right along the hood of it, there's these faint little runes. He goes, "This is some-- these are Sylvan. I don't know if any of you read more the classics."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I read Sylvan, and there you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, there you go. This is specifically a cloak with an elven enchantment, designed to help "make things difficult to see. So there's that one as well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, let's take a look at that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all we got."

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's pretty cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much is that running for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, an answer."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anywhere else around town I could get an enchanted weapon of some sort?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unfortunately, enchanted weaponry is a very specialized--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But everybody else has really cool weapons, and I just have an axe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. I'm sorry about that. If you want to commission an axe, we can start working on "enchanting one for you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much would that cost?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it depends on what sort of enchantment you're looking for. If you just--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Something that makes me really cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would make me hit really hard and probably open wounds that don't close ever, and maybe poison people, and also turn them into candy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah." He's like, "She wants to see if you could "enchant an axe that hits really hard and is really cool and wounds don't close and--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you know, really bad wounds, also it really hurts a lot, and it makes people turn pink, and also it makes people, like, start dancing and stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Pumat Prime is actually, in his head, doing math. "I could probably manage "something like that. I got about an eight-month window for completion, and it would probably run "you about... between ten to twelve thousand gold."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (continually coughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You haven't come this far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seems like a really reasonable price for all those things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I can guarantee it. Won't find anything better than that, for a specified number of "enchantments, this side of Rexxentrum."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about just one of those enchantments? What about it just makes people start dancing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Axe dance!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you want a weapon that, when it hits somebody, they start dancing?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They go. Yeah, and they can't stop. It's like, it would be really hard for them to stop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. So the only enchantment you're requiring is the possible ability of making "something dance uncontrollably."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, that would be so cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I really liked the candy thing, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like that would be harder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe they can just decorate it to look like candy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I could decorate it to look like candy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, craft night!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sad you're not here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shopping and crafts, Travis!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take both my eyes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have your journaling kit? Are you proficient?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's on TV, babe? HG-- nope, I'm out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Michael's had a stationery sale!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There we go. That's going to be-- It's doable. It's pricey. That one will put you about "8,000 gold."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have that much either. Wait, do I?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about layaway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry. If you want just something that's pretty sharp and helps you hit a little better, I "could do that for much cheaper."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's see. That one will put you back about, I'd say, maybe 400 gold?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! That sounds way better!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Could finish that in about four or five days, yeah."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! Okay, I'll do that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All righty, just provide the weapon, and we'll get that taken care of for you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here, take this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay." What kind of axe is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an axe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Handaxe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a handaxe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Handaxe. Okay, so it can be thrown as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! Yes, it can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you just now realize that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. We'll go ahead and we'll get right on that for you, not a worry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So that'd be 400 gold for that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's 400 gold pieces. What else you looking to buy?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm thinking I'm--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we should get that, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, no, I think I want--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Longswords aren't simple weapons, so I can't?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But I don't know. I like broken things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cooing) What about the cloak?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, no, we're getting the cloak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, so that's--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Caleb, do you want to split that cloak with me, maybe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm allocating my funds to other things, my friend, I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh well, I'll get the cloak then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll help you get the cloak.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, here's the deal, Pumat. What was that you said five or so minutes ago about us being your number one customers?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, yeah, and you would give us a deal if we bought a whole bunch of stuff?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this where we go for the diamonds, too?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am dropping a total, if we're all amenable, 960 gold on various things, and I think that is a pretty good pile. Maybe you could knock a couple hundred off of the price of those bracers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check, with advantage since everybody's helping you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on! Get it! That's good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that is a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the Pumats talking to you kind of, "Let me go ahead and have a conversation with the "boss man. Hold on just a second." Turns around the corner. You hear some hushed voices. "Yeah, fine, "sure." He comes back out, "All right, we got ourselves an approval for a discount there. We'll "be happy to knock about a hundred gold off that total price for you, if that's amenable to you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's pretty amenable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure. All of us save 20 gold, still pretty good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, so who's buying what?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 25 gold!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm getting the sword and the cloak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sword and the cloak."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going halvsies on the cloak with him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, well, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All righty. Well, here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take those bracers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well here, I'll do a total price here, and then you guys can--"

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's 400 for getting your handaxe enchanted."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, and then another two because I'm going in halvsies on the cloak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I'm doing a total amount here first, don't-- You guys can decide how to divvy it up for you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you take cards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So that's 450 for the cloak. That's 1,200 for the bracers. That's 300 for the handle. No dust?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we'll pass on the dust for now. It's interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And then you got a-- and then 300 for the spells."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and 600 gold with of paper and ink, and then 20 for all the incense you have right now, and I'm going to leave 40 in advance for more incense coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hold on a second there. So it's 300 worth of spells, and you said 600 worth of paper and "ink, right?" At this time you guys have been discussing, the other Pumat comes back with his cloak with a big old crate in his hand and goes, "Got the rest of the paper and ink. Hold on." Sets it down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, jeez.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then that is 20 gold for your incense?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to give you 60 gold now for that much incense. I understand you only have about 20 now, but I know you're good for the rest, so I'll just pay in advance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Are you guys all marking off your amounts?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Costs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we're waiting for the total, but yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm taking just 25 gold off of my bracers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Based on how many pieces you've thrown at me, it's probably better to have you all just "deduct what you've spent individually. I was going to try that, but then..."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That got a little chaotic there."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Give me them bracers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All righty, so there's your sword, there's your bracers, there's your cloak."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With the dust of deliciousness, is that one use, or multiple uses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Six servings of dust in this."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why I was like hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's still pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's still good, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Okay, I want some of that, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Well, there you go. Go ahead and mark off that amount there as well. When all is "said and done, when you've marked off your amounts, here's a hundred gold back. You may "redistribute it as you see fit."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit, you got a hundred dollar rebate!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got a rebate, 100 gold!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that was what you haggled them down.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, so we're-- Okay, we're good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just makes it easier than adding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will you take five gold off of the dust because you like me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We all take 25-- We each saved 25 gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 25 gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That means he likes me! 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, only because you asked so nice, but don't tell the boss."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) I won't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Feels so good! Feels like real shopping; I get a shopping high! Cathartic!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So I'll see you back here in about five days or so there, Jester, and we should have a "fresh, new, enchanted handaxe there for you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All righty. Well, it's been a pleasure."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you for your business. What was that book that you were reading?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, it's--" He pulls it up again. "It's that Taryon fellow, or whatever. But I'm most of "the way through it. Kind of a slow reader."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you the last Pumat of the Pumats to read it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, we've been kind of passing it around as we each finish it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hmm. You should form a book club.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll ask him. Really appreciate the suggestion."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, thank you for your business, I have a lot to do. And I am going to attempt to lift the crate of paper.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can help with that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. (grunts) Yeah, that's-- Oh, that's heavy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With the legs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (grunts)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Exeunt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of the weight is the materials that contain the paper. The paper isn't very heavy, but because it is specifically designed and made for the uses of inscribing and enchantment and other things, it is contained in very, very careful, protective wooden boxes. They're all stacked repeatedly within this crate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I guess as we're leaving, walking along, Beauregard, who's sort of googling at her new bracers, do you have any plans--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they look cool?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know how to answer that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hey, Caduceus! Pleasure to meet you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's a pleasure to meet you, as well. I'm sure we'll see each other again real soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll hope so. Brightened up the room."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, thank you. And what a room to brighten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aww, you're too kind."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're the best.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they, like, go with the outfit, though?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look angry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah? Dope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any, er, plans to-- well, I would like to, I don't know if you want to. But may I go to the library again with you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going back probably tomorrow, next day, something like that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, for a day or two?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a Friday-to-Monday, four-days-three-nights type of thing, if you're down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Er, yes. If you wouldn't mind, I would be very--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't have to stay the whole time, but that's what I'm going to do. You can do whatever the fuck you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If they give me-- Would I be allowed to peruse this--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not your fucking babysitter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did not say you were my babysitter! I just wanted to look at the books!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just want to get that out there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know why you had that in your mind! I just want to look-- Thank you. And I walk off with my paper.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to be looking for a gem shop. And also, if there's an herb shop. I've been meaning to learn how to make healing potions. I've gotten a little bit of a basic understanding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) I do have a couple things left on my to-do list though, okay? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And some general shopping that's just some stuff that doesn't really have--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's familiar. (sniffs) Yeah. And so, much like Toucan Sam, you follow your nose--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It always knows!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --to Grace of the Wilds, and there you see a female woman, 50s, with kind of wild, big, black, curly hair, who's just sitting there. Nobody else is paying mind to the front, little tent that she has set up that is attached to what appears to be the rest of her shop, which is mostly closed-off and dark. As you approach, she glances over and goes, "Hah! Hi! Can I help you? What do you need, what do you need? What can I do?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi! Are you Grace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Welcome, welcome."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hi! I was curious-- I was looking to maybe start learning how to make some healing potions of some kind--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For training? You want to train?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And also, I'm-- just some stuff for cooking. And otherwise I'm just looking for a nice general set of a few things. I've got a list here, just some food flavors as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, of course! Just give me your list, I'd like to see."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, sure. This is actually my general--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. I figured. "Oh. Ah. Okay, yeah!" And as she's talking to you, you watch as her other hand takes a piece of chalk and is writing on the wall behind her. "I'd be more than happy to help, and I can help! A lot of things I can help you with too, and I'm happy to!" And then, in kind of crappy handwriting underneath all the various prices of the herbs and things that are provided you now see 'training.' She's added it to her list of things that she does, as talking to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're probably the person to ask if there's a good tea shop in town. I feel like you'd probably know where to get a nice caffeinated beverage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! Oh, yes. Oh yes. Oh yes, I can help with the tea. The tea? I can help "with. So, training! What do you want to train in? Please, tell me."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been hoping to learn how to make healing potions, actually, in general. Just start to kind of break in that, uh--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, okay. Okay, that can be done. It may take some time. Little bit of time. Give me your "time, we'll make it work."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Oh my god, she's got a caffeine fucking IV under the desk. Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The herbalism kit for this is-- It's five-- you already have one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have an herbalism kit, I just want to-- do I need a special proficiency or get the ingredients to help make one. I do have the herbalism kit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you would be purchasing proficiencies, the training is what you would be doing. This would be the bulk of your downtime, because it will take a while for you to really get--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I only had a couple other light things I was going to do anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the full training for this will come to about, I'll say, 200 gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you are now proficient in the herbalism kit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I was already proficient in the herbalism kit, I was just specifically looking for the stuff to make the potions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I misunderstood! Oh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I got that already. I've never-- Back when I did this they didn't have all this craziness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've got you. Well, if that's the case, buying the materials-- You're essentially buying them at half-price. You can make healing potions, but you get to make them at 25 gold apiece, as opposed to 50.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure! I'll get-- Let's get 150 gold worth of that, and then probably some cooking spices, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. Cooking spices will run you a gold for the full set.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, so it's 151. Anything else of interest or otherwise? Maybe some good beverages or otherwise there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can find a whole bevy of beverages all throughout the Pentamarket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Other than that I've got diamonds and some-- I'm looking for some general store kind of stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So at 150 gold, (counting) that's six healing potions that you have the materials to make. But you can spend your downtime during this week to make a few, if you'd like.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll put you at about one potion per day of creation. So you can easily take this time to make all six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, easily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're baseline healing potions, level one, but you should be able to do so. Cool. And you made a friend with Jasna Bree!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, that's a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's a little sad that she doesn't get a chance to teach you or train you, but she's like, "That's okay, next time! Next time. Whenever you feel like it, you come on by. I'll teach you. No "worries."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's excellent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Deuce.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to buy some diamonds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need diamonds. I also need a new tea kettle. But yeah, we need diamonds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A tea kettle you can get.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not quite this hat, but it's in the right direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wider brim?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wider brim. Wider brim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say you manage to acquire the cooking supplies, the kettle, some fine teas that you can acquire, and altogether I'd say--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have stuff to cook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say that would put you back about-- with the hat? Four gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, man. All right, 155.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You weren't asking for anything too crazy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope, that's cool. I'm easy. Now we just need to find the diamonds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now we need to find some diamonds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So for that? Let's see here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I typed in the bracers and they showed up with an image.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How? What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's in D&D Beyond. (singing) D&D Beyond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Be my girl tonight, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They even had my hand-me-down Periapt of Wound Closure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Both of us, or just me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, if you're both looking for it, you can aid or help. So, advantage on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Advantage!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is for diamonds? Ooh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Investigation. 11. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Usually, they're already embedded in jewelry and most jewelers are out there. Eventually, somebody points you to a place, like, (dismissively) "If anyone will have it, it's probably over at Suvo's Secrets."

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Suvo's Secrets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suvo's Secrets. And they point you over to this large, gray shop tent that has an ominous feel when you look at it. As bright a day as it is, it's like the Addams Family house in the Pentamarket. It looks... it looks unwelcome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On Halloween, all the kids are outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks closed. Except for there's-- where the flaps come together in the middle. It doesn't look like anything that you should buy from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm very excited. It looks great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you enter Suvo's Secrets-- (laughing) You're hitting the tent front? You're not walking in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we're seeing if it's open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's open. It's an entrance. You go inside and the interior-- It's maybe 20 feet by 20 feet, it's not a very large interior space. And it looks like there are some tables set up on the far ends, perimeter to the outside of it. And on the back, there is a very, very large custom rocking chair that is just like, (creaking). And sitting in it, you see an older, very intense-looking female dragonborn, bronze-scaled, but in the age they're starting to turn a bit green at the edges, kind of patinaed a little. She sits there in the rocking chair, hands kind of crossed on the chest, just rocking and looking at you as you enter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a nice place you got here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you very much. Welcome to Suvo's Secrets."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you Suvo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. Who are you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Jester. What are you looking for that I might be helping you with?"

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Secrets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And diamonds, probably.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Diamonds and secrets. Secret diamonds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She leans forward and her hands hit the front of her knees. Leaning back, she looks very small, but once she steps into the little bit of light that's coming through the front of the tent, Suvo's a fairly large dragonborn, and, even just leaning forward sitting, is almost as tall as you are, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Diamonds, you say?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How many diamonds are you looking for?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many do you have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe 12."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a lot of diamonds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That sounds like a lot of diamonds. Are they big diamonds or little diamonds? I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She reaches back and there's this large-- It looks just like a sack. Just a general sack and she reaches and grabs the edge and scoots it over without breaking eye contact. It scrapes across the ground and you hear things clattering around inside, like she's carrying a large pouch of various pots and pans. She reaches in, still looking at you. "One."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Caleb should be here right now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two." And eventually counts out 12 varying-sized diamonds. They all look-- Some are cut, it looks like one of them is a little rough, and just hasn't been cut by a jeweler yet. But, sure enough, they're--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can tell they're really diamonds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your Laura is showing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, just making sure she's not ripping us off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll join you in this perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Ooh, that's good. Perception. 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've seen a lot of diamonds in my day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have. You've seen some fine jewelry, especially from your mother's chests.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, her chests. Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's lots of diamonds right in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So many carats! So many carats!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whoosh, whoosh, whoosh) It's sharp and dangerous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ow! Ow! Ow!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Best lay ever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ahh! Ahh! I'm cut, I'm cut! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Children. We're all children.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's why we're here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is serious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are all legitimate diamonds with varying degrees of worth. But looking at the batch, there's probably about 700-- We'll say, rounded off, about-- Roughly 750 gold worth of diamonds of the group, that she set.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 600. About 600 will do both of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so we'll buy all but, you know, these two little ones. Because those probably add up to about 150.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is all right. They will still be here when you come back."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (creaking, thumping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll do 300 and you do 300?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that works for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you each have 300 gold worth of diamonds on you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anything else that I want?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are many things."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Secrets!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grabs and pulls the sack back over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does she just have the sack? The one bag in the shop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. The tables are all empty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) That's so cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is just a sack where she keeps all of the goods.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All of her secrets! Oh, I get it now! That's great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is a treated owlbear matron hand."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what that is, but that's really cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "25 gold. It's a good keepsake."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a big old batch of garlic in a small netted sack. She goes, "Garlic. Good for cooking and also for keeping away... vampyr!" (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what we could do? Get the garlic, sprinkle the Dust of Deliciousness on the garlic, and feed it to the vampyr!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then they'd be in pain and very susceptible to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a religion check, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would I know this stuff? A natural one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to see what else is in the sack before-- We shouldn't negotiate until we know everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, this is true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, for the sake of brevity--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For the sake of brevity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a whole slew of strange knickknacks--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we sit there while she pulls out the entire bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it takes the better part of 30 or 40 minutes or so. There's an iron mask. Where the mouth should be, it's just these two metal tusks that stick out, almost like a cast-iron orc mask.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Russell Crowe! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you not entertained!?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the rest of it is just absolute junk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take the garlic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Two gold." Which is really expensive for fucking garlic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm thinking, that's-- One gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
