lines.text: One gold?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hardcore negotiations.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is yours."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Secrets!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's still overpriced for garlic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's so overpriced for garlic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much is the healing potion?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's good garlic. Never can pay too-- Yeah, it's really nice garlic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Heirloom. Artisinal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is actually pretty artisanal garlic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Artisanal garlic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It came out of the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so yeah. This would be a greater healing potion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's expensive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe not from her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ask.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She just charged two gold for garlic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. For this, she's like, "This will run 250 gold pieces. But it will keep you from dying in "places where you will probably most likely be dying."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. I would take it, but I don't have enough gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pulls it back and puts it back in the satchel. "Then you will not have it!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hold out the garlic one more time. Just checking. Seems legit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) She seems to nod like, "Well done."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I did that wrong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, you did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was because I was listening to what he was saying. I was distracted. There we go. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No mask?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much for the mask?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't know where that's been.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah. Ooh. Three gold!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Er, seven!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Deal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be careful. They say the curse lasts for whoever-- I don't remember the rest of it. It's "just a mask, there's no enchantment. It's just a very scary mask. But congratulations, it's yours."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's all bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all bullshit. Well, most of it's bullshit from this individual.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Is that the end of it?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel very satisfied with this entire expedition.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be safe and come back again. I am very interested to sell to you what else might come my way."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Suvos.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Shallots! Chives!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You step out. The bright light of the midday sun-- The clouds of the previous storm have parted a bit and there's actually bright light and your eyes have to adjust. You're like, "Aah, Ah! Ah."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm perfectly satisfied with my shopping experience.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm done with my shopping. All of my money is gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Who else? We've done a few things with you guys. We've done Nott's stuff. Fjord, anything you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Yeah. The previous events have rocked Fjord a little bit. Are there any bars or taverns in Zadash that may house frequent sailors or people of trade, merchants?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sailors, not so much. The Empire is landlocked aside from the very far north, and those waters are in the frigid depths. It's a lot of ice floes and treacherous water up there. So there is very little passage up north. The Menagerie Coast, as you know, is where all of the port towns are, and that's the relationship between the Empire and The Menagerie Coast. That agreement is based on the fact that, essentially, the Menagerie Coast holds all the long-term imports and exports in the palm of their hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know that I've made that trip. How far is it from Zadash back to the northernmost part of the Menagerie Coast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be Nicodranas. Nicodranas from Zadash, it's a little over a week to get there, I'd say.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sighs) I think Fjord's going to take a steed and start heading south by himself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? He's going on walkabout?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's going on a walkabout.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While he heads south, I'd like to adopt various disguises as I stop in inns, taverns, places of trade, and carefully hear if anyone is mentioning the name "Sabian," if people are talking about ships, and try and casually make my way further south, knowing that I have an amount of time to get back north. I'd like to try to make my way down and see what I can hear and find out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make three successive investigation checks for me, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. 12, nine, and a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make it as far south as Trostenwald before the frustration wells up inside you. It's been a series of dead ends. You've asked around and listened, and anyone who would've crossed paths with some of the shipping lanes that you're familiar with and that Sabian was familiar with, none of them are passing this far north. You assume that to continue this, you would have to go to the Menagerie Coast, and that would involve a thorough passage through Nicodranas and the various wharf taverns and seeing what old connections you might be able to dredge up in that time, but that's going to take you a little while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think I'll make it to the end of that week and start to make my way back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the end of the week, you'll get not quite to Nicodranas. If you want to, you can traverse the Wuyun Gorge, pass through the Wuyun Gates, and head into the Menagerie Coast. You will be alone, and it isn't a not-dangerous road. So just be aware. There are some possibilities.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I know now that the strength is in the numbers of the group. I'll stop and head back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sure?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. After this unfortunately not-fruitful travel south in seeking out any possible word of Sabian, you shift your attention back and decide to rally with your allies. Perhaps that's the direction you want to go in the future. Okay, what else would you like to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Very well. Anybody else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, if that invitation was good and I have about, as she said, the next day, Caleb's going to pull an all-nighter. I'm going to spend time in a hotel room, an inn, and take the lucky rock and I'm going to fill it with transmutative power and make a Transmuter's Stone out of it, and for now we will have it let me see in the dark. For now. I would also transcribe every spell that was in the book and every scroll that I have found so that I use up all the paper that I have purchased. Have every spell. And Frumpkin is back. As a cat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Cat Frumpkin has returned.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is only one Frumpkin. I stayed up all night doing all of those things because they're very time-intensive and would have went to find Beauregard, very tired and ready to go, to stay at the library as long as I am able. She said a number of days, and when those days are up, the thing that I would do is spend as much time that is left with the-- I would borrow Jester's haversack, if she would let me, and spend time with the dodecahedron.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. We'll get to that. First, you guys make your way to the archive and you enter there, and the following morning Caleb is very tired-looking, but also hard to tell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'Sup, man! You ready for this monk retreat? Monk retreat!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to learn all of the martial arts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's either dead or there's a handful of people going through it. Today it's a handful of people going through. You're like, "Oh wow, there's four people in here researching right now."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within a short time-- what are you looking to do, Beauregard?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I ask around and see if Dairon is there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see them descend the stairs with another figure. Gray robes with blue lining, hood pulled back, and there you see Zeenoth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He steps down and goes, "Beauregard. I wasn't aware you had returned."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi. Dairon, unfortunately, is still out on the front lines."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, she's been sent to assess political threats beyond the eastern border. Been gone for "about 30 days and is said to return in the next 45 before we send anyone after her. But I'm sure "she's fine."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She said she'd be back within a month, that she was just checking out the front lines at Bladegarden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, things change when they're at that moment of conflict."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You sent her behind enemy lines?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. She progressed behind enemy lines and then wrote to us that she was staying for an "extended period. She's impetuous. I think you may know something about that. Anyway, I'm sorry "Dairon is not here. What are you inquiring about?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just hoping to check in with her and catch up on some coaching.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah. Well, there is Tubo. Tubo is quite an accomplished monk of the Cobalt Soul and might be "able to help you, whereas Dairon could not."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I know Tubo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen Tubo. You've not directly interacted, because Tubo, much like Dairon, works on a higher level. You hadn't quite garnished the attention beyond just being "that brat" for a while. Tubo is this very dark-skinned halfling with very short, widow's peak-type hair, and this very calm smile about him. Very well-respected, but you haven't really seen him move or do anything other than walking through the archive and be present.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he an expositor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hmm. Yeah, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. I shall return. Good seeing you again."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within a short time, you see coming from down the same staircase, Tubo, his arms folded in front of him as he descends and turns toward you. "So you "are Beauregard, correct?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you're looking for training while your expositor is away, correct?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I mean--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Follow me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Also, I got this guy with me. Can he get a room and a library pass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Zeenoth, who's a little bit behind, goes, "I'll accompany him in his reading, if that's all right?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Zeenoth, Caleb. Caleb, Zeenoth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've met, in Trostenwald."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hallo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello. Please, lead the way to where you'd wish to read."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, thank you. Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tubo brings you down. "Very well. Show me what you've got." For the sake of brevity--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Roll up a new character. Tubo splatters you across the wall. You spar for a bit, showing him the limits of your capabilities, and he's deftly, with a smile on his face, dodging, parrying. You get a few good hits in and he backs away. "Very good," and then begins to overwhelm you with his assault, but never enough to inflict pain, just enough to throw you off your guard until a moment he turns around and puts his hands up into a cross once more and goes, "Four days. I "need four days with you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. And then what happens?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And then your training for now is complete."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Day one begins. Time to read."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes you back upstairs and begins to collect books and throw them into a pile and sits you down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at Caleb across the library.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You begin reading and it's getting frustrated, but as you're reading, Tubo begins to lean in and say, "As you're reading, think carefully about what you're trying to find. What "you're trying to learn."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, what am I trying to learn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you looking to research?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there any type of history on families of Wildemount, or any type of underground trade going on? Family trees? Connections?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the portion of this day, Tubo begins to instruct you on how to not just read and research, but in focusing your spiritual energy on the specific things you're searching, you begin to find quick ways to Johnny 5 through tomes to find what you're looking for. With this comes your ability to spend a ki point to gain advantage on an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This time, he begins to show you how to use that same internal, spiritual energy or ki at the moment of impact to give off this very localized wave of spiritual energy. He begins to tell you how, "This can break through defenses of things that are meant to not be touched with a mortal "hand. This is intended as a way to bypass sometimes the mundane protections." Through this training, he teaches you how use your empowered strikes, where now your physical fists and attacks as a monk are considered magical.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ghost puncher.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can now punch ghosts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Day three, he brings you down to the chamber with a chair, and says, "Sit."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tell me. Tell me a secret."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this Truth or Dare?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kind of. Do you want to tell me a secret?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a dare option?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then it's not Truth or Dare. You know Truth or Dare, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks frustrated, turns around, does a little loop, comes back, and as you're about to speak up again, he does a series of quick hits that hurt a little, but that catch you right in the clavicle, the side of throat, and then right under the chin. As you pull back, make a saving throw for me, please. This would be a charisma saving throw, I believe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 12. Not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he puts you through hours of this rigorous training, he goes, "Very well. The time to show "what you can do has come." Claps. You watch as two other monks come down. (laughs) But they have bows and arrows, and they have a third one they hand to him. They all nock the arrows and aim them right at you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tubo versus Beau with bows! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bo-bo-bo-bo-bo-bo-bo.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's deeply accurate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Tubo goes, "Fire." All three arrows come toward you. That's a 19 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 19 just hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's another 19, actually. And that is a 23. So all three hit you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus. Fuck your bracers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got new shit! (impacts)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm Wonder Woman! I'm not Wonder Woman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first arrow is ten points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do the thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Spend a ki point. How many points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten? No points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You catch one arrow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, I'm level six now, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One point of damage. I lied.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take one point of damage. You just barely catch it. It manages to nick the side of your shoulder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two other arrows are coming at you as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can only do this thing once though, right? Or I can keep spending ki points to do that, right? I'll do it one more time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you can do that now, if you have another reaction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right, which I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have multiple reactions?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody, be a monk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I spend a ki point. One, two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to spend a ki point to reduce the damage. You spend a ki point to throw it back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I will spend an extra reaction, then, to catch the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spend the same ki point. Roll for damage reduction on the next one. That's 12 points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled 11, so another one point of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You catch both arrows. The third one is coming towards you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And one more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spend another ki point. That's two ki points now. You get to roll to reduce the third one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the blink of an eye, you've deflected all three arrows shot at the same time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to Tubo and I go: Did you see that?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did. And with that, your training is complete."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. I don't get to kill those guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No!" He hands the shortbow to the other one and they all head back upstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I'm sure you're really lovely people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Impressive. Dairon was not wrong about you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what has-- Dairon's been talking about me? What has she been saying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That you are an apt pupil. Now, our time is done. I have things to do. And four days with you "has been more than enough."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I get that a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He makes his way back up and escorts you out of the training chamber.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, hasn't the last four days been amazing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, really peaceful, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go find Caleb and I go: Let's go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four days later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So during this time, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I had four days to peruse at will, I would have spent the first day trying to research anything I could find about Xhorhas, the Xhorasians' mentions of beacons, of them living many lives, their religion, if possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check with advantage to find all the right information.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Investigation? That is 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whether it be by proximity of remnants of his power deep beneath the surface that have grown close to these societies, but there is whispers and research that say that some of these dark elf societies are being driven slowly mad by this influence. Strangely, what studies you've been able to find that talk about penetrating the Kryn Dynasty's intense boundaries-- I fucking looked at you immediately, Laura, because I knew where it was going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You see? You know it, too. That means you looked at me because you knew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of course. As soon as I read the word I was like-- Without fail.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pray to the great god titty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And what remains of that is ancient and crumbling and largely ignored by the society.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I find any mention of these beacons-- he mentioned beacons, plural-- and reincarnation or multiple lives?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also learn that a number of people, mostly children of adolescent age, have been found abducted in the night by the Kryn on occasion, though the number has steeply grown this past generation, years after the first open conflicts with the Kryn began. The last thing you discover is the leader of the dynasty is known as Empress Leylas Kryn. She is called an "umavi" by them, though the word's meaning is unknown by current research. Accounts of the Empress speak of her as a powerful and dangerous warrior on the battlefield. And well over 600 years old or more, as records date back that far since she arrived in local history. That's what you've discovered about the Kryn Dynasty and Xhorhas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I spend a day reading about that. I will spend every remaining day reading about-- I was rushed the first time I came here, so I'm going to spend every day left reading about the weave of time and any mortals' attempts to control it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The weave of time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's some restricted reading bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some powerful arcane influences can accelerate or slow the rate at which time passes locally, even stop it. There are some stories from the Age of Arcanum that speak of the greatest of sages experimenting with reversing the forward momentum of time, and supposedly with some success. But the process apparently was so taxing and the energies required so extensive that it nearly killed those who passed through this natural flow. That's as much as you can pick up on the specific research involving that shift of time. They're more footnotes and like a, "We don't mess with that because those who tried have mostly been "disintegrated or destroyed in the process."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nearly killed. Does it talk about any of the people who were nearly killed but weren't?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, but they existed close to 1500 years ago.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No record of their names?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The names that were in there are none that correlate to anything you'd recognize.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would still have spent the entire three days reading about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll send you those notes later. You do pick up, because of your very high roll, there are apparently some newer arcane experiments regarding time and reality being fielded within the Soltryce Academy in Rexxentrum. A newer magical energy seems to have been discovered, or rediscovered, that can seemingly adjust such properties with ease. It's being referred to as "Dunamis."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dunamis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But other than that, there's very little information because all that seems to be proprietary within the Academy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, good, cool. Super cool. Danke. Then I'm all done with all my shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot, I should've looked at my list. I had one or two other little things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Fjord, what else would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You didn't want to just walk for six days and walk back for six days?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was like, I feel like I came up-- Oh, there's more shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was like, are you sure that's all you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Examine it, specifically the eye, if it has that sort of-- in the letter, it looked like there was a gash into the sphere itself. Does it represent that, is it smooth? Does it move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a singular eye that is embedded in it, that is looking out what would essentially be towards the left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it near the crossguard, or is it near the pommel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's near the crossguard, in the center of the hilt. When you look at it, it doesn't seem to move or shift or pay any attention. Practicing the next few days and trying some things out, you focus some of your arcane gifts towards an object, casting Witch Bolt towards a nearby rock or low, dried, and forgotten trunk of a tree. At the moment the incantation begins, the eye shifts to look towards the target of the spell. The spell explodes and you look back at the hilt, and it's already reverted back to where it was before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Super fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it did seem to react to when the spell was cast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Creepy. What the hell does that mean? Okay. When I get back, could I make my way to The Gentleman for just a quick convo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, all right. So you make your way to The Evening Nip. By the time you've returned, it's been the better part of the two-week period of time, and you guys are also generally worried the fact that Fjord just vanished during this time period.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He left while we were shopping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Big surprise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Travis is shouting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys are going to shop, ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (poof sound)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was it?

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Spooky exit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way to the subterranean basement of The Evening Nip. The Gentleman is not currently present, but upon asking around, and you wait for about 20 minutes or so, he does return from the storage room to the side where you had previously been led down and through the Underworks. As he comes in, he sees you and sits on the other side of the table, throwing his leg over one side and sitting at a very comfortable and casual way across from you. "Fjord, I'm being "told that you're looking for me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, I appreciate you making some time for me this evening. Turns out we might be traveling a little bit pretty soon. We're going to be making our way towards the Wayfarer's Cove. Your knowledge of areas outside of Zadash seems so extensive, what with the errands you sent us on. I was wondering, could you share with me any knowledge you might have about criminal underbellies, any competitors you might have in business that's not of an official nature in cities, particularly around Nicodranas, Port Damali, the Menagerie Coast. Is your reach that far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have some reaches in places, yes. That's quite a scope you're requesting. I would say it's "a good bet that most criminal elements you would encounter there are not at my network, except for "a handful. It might be more useful to you to know the ones to trust."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's where I was going with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Port Damali, you say?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's where I'm from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The jewel of the coast. I've been a number of times, though it's been years since I've been "able to leave my work here alone. So if you're looking to expand your portfolio beyond Zadash, "that is commendable. The one contact I could recommend in Port Damali would be Father Dwondaff Pierce."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Father Dwondaff Pierce?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dresses well. He helms the Pearl Shrine, a house "of worship to Avandra, the Changebringer. Tell him that you bring many gifts."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bring many gifts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Should you not work with Father Pierce and his network, be careful. You could easily find "yourself on an opposing side to my business, and I do not take kindly to betrayal."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed, I wouldn't dare. After all, you do have a little way of keeping track of where we are and what we do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That I do."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hopefully we can be of some service to you down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If something comes to mind, I'll send it your way."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And if anything comes to mind that would be of interest to my ears, business or otherwise, "please keep me informed."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can be assured that I will. Thank you for your time, I'll leave you now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course." Then he goes off to get a drink at the bar. As you turn around, right there at the steps is Cree, the dark-furred tabaxi. She approaches and goes, "I'm sorry to bother you, I "noticed you descend here. I have heard since your last arrival that there were losses in your journey."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (stuttering) Hm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have had a number of uncomfortable dreams in the week, and... I cannot sense Lucien."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tell me about these dreams.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god. Oh, that's good. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have a very hollow feeling about this."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) God, why was I gone for six weeks? Okay. (normal volume) Yes, unfortunately your dreams may have some merit. I myself was missing for most of our journey, and it seems, unfortunately, that Lucien befell a terrible fate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was what I was fearing."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I was there I could give you more detail, but I found out much in the same way you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe I had put too much faith."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said he left before and then came back. If you don't mind my asking, the last time that he left, do you remember the circumstances of his departure?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But he did not survive."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then you saw him here for the first time in quite a while, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two years.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two years? Two years. Are you-- and forgive me if this is too personal-- are you expecting to see him again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I wasn't expecting to see him this last time. I feel like whatever grace brought him back to us, maybe it was your carelessness that took him from us again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed, maybe it was. You have my apologies and my condolences.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is all right. I have started a new life here, and it has been serving me well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hate to leave you with such sour news, but I must be going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Such are these days. Thank you for your candor. She turns around and walks away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. Then I'll head back to The Leaky Tap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys have all gathered up at The Leaky Tap?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone's done their stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I have not done mine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what do you want to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mine's very simple. I'm going to spend a little time every day-- I'm going to find the nicest park in town. I'm going to spend every day and I'm going to meditate and try and get some guidance. I'm trying to have another epiphany about what happens next. I'm going to sit quietly and meditate every day somewhere green, or whatever passes for it in this city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a wisdom check for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. That was a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You've spent so much of your life in the tranquility of the cold and quiet Savalierwood, and even in the most nature-based portion of the city of Zadash, the general din and chaos of the city is too distracting. You're unable to reach that meditative state where you're able to feel connected with nature and with the Wildmother, so Melora's guidance does not come to you. You have to continue to throw your lot in with these strange folks that dragged you out of your home.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair. I guess the only-- no, that's right, we're done. I think we got everything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, everyone's done their thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! I am not done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, because I want to make the Traveler like me again, because obviously he doesn't and that's why he didn't come save me. I'm going to use these two weeks to scout out all of the temples to the other gods and really see the guard schedules and the priest schedules and try to sneak in. I'll probably enlist the help of Nott here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll help you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because you're good at sneaking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we do have something we can--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We got you something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before we do this, this will be extra helpful for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it? I don't like this. Is it something-- is it made of dead people?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just check it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Made of paper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's so nicely wrapped. It's so tiny.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, imagine it's a lot bigger than that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "From your friendly--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It does say rouge, doesn't it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it says rogue, I'm fucking with you. "From your friendly neighborhood healers." You guys can heal? It's a cloak! Wow! It looks so cool and fancy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put it on. I bet it changes size when you put it on, because most magical things do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will put it on and spend some time with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're able to attune to it and gain the benefits of a Cloak of Elvenkind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we're going to go and try to sneak in and really fuck up--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you'll have to decide which ones you're going to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much time do we have? What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much do I owe you for this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You owe us nothing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a gift.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have nothing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got tons of money. Way more than I'll ever spend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is the Raven's Den, which sits near the Ossuary Gates--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I already fucked with that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where you've done your jobs off the Taskboard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seems like there's a lot of guards there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's a lot of guards there. There's the Platinum House, which is a temple to the Platinum Dragon. That also exists in the Interstead Sprawl. Not too far from Steam's Respite, which is the bathhouse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, yeah, let's do that one because it's close to the bathhouse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which one is that? Which god?

lines.name: LAURA, MATT
lines.text: The Platinum Dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, that seems right. What are we going to do to it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's also in the Signet Wall, which is the military district, there is The Shrine of the Dawn, which is to the Dawnfather. It's up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's just fitting, isn't it? No, I'm going to do the Platinum Dragon because it's next to the bathhouse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Platinum House it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're trying to destroy this place?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Paint it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going at day or nighttime?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're checking out during the day, you know, like we're visitors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's in the process of giving this very deeply empowering speech about, "The majesty of Bahamut "bestows upon us the knowledge and the grace in which we can be beacons of truth and justice in a "world that wishes to swallow all with chaos."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (snoring) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah, the midday stakeout appears to go well. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How often does he come back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's there most of the day, and in the evening he appears to go nap somewhere within the Platinum House.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then he gives his sermon during the next day and the next day? We scout it out a couple days in a row to really get the feel for the guards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With advantage because Nott's helping me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh Jesus H. Macy. Nine. Nein!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a couple entrances, some hallways.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take some of the firecrackers we got from Hupperdook, and I want to set them off during his sermon. And then I want to-- but I'm going to Invoke Duplicity, so it looks like I'm actually still there listening to the sermon. Then while that's happening-- but I'm also Disguise Self, so I also want to look like somebody else while it's happening so nobody can trace it back to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That sounds complicated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is really good stuff. And then I want to run over to-- is there a big statue of the Platinum Dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is in the center, yeah. It's not built on the floor. It's actually held aloft in the central domed archway right beneath where that glowing dome at the top is. At nighttime, as you've seen it, it emits this faint, white glow and is this beacon in the middle of the darkened city, aside from the various bits of torchlight that hit the streets. Beneath this dome, you see the large, carved-- looks like a pure platinum, but it's probably a polished silver-- statue of the dragon, wings outstretched, looking down over the chambers and hovers about 15 feet off the ground, where all the rest of the folks gather for this sermon and/or sit there to meditate and pray and worship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a really bad time to do this because there's lots of people around. Can I do it at night? Is there less people at night? Would I have learned at least that much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, at night, there are less people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I come back a second time after setting up the fireworks. Now the next time--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're here again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to do it right. This time I'm coming prepared with my paints and a mustache.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your Anarchist's Cookbook.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My Anarchist's Cookbook, a couple brochures for the Traveler, and I steal Cad's straw hat that he bought-- sorry-- and, yeah, we're going to make the Platinum Dragon look like a really cool farmer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Okay. So we're going to mess with the statue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I do. Is it stupid or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if someone comes in? We kill everyone in the place?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, if somebody comes in, you need to distract them, okay? Don't let anybody see me, because this might take a while.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'm the distraction and the lookout.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're the distraction. I also Invoke Duplicity to where it looks like I'm still there on the outside and I can also be hanging out with you so you don't look like a random person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you disguise yourself to be?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The old woman that was in the other, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys approach in the evening, together? Are you disguising yourself as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, no. You know what I should disguise myself as? The sermon guy. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's mostly just a few caretakers that watch it through the night and some lost souls that have found their way there in the evening and they need guidance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get them out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're in there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, distract them and make them go away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll do my best.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what you should say, say that the sermon guy, whoever I am, tell them I need some quiet time in the temple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll disguise myself using Disguise Self as an elderly gnomish woman, and I'll wander into the temple, I guess. Ahem, pardon me. All patrons, I have a request from the Holy Father himself that we vacate the premises. They have to refresh all the holy water-- that's good-- every 30 days, and wouldn't you know it? Today's that day! So out of the pool for a few minutes, and then when it's all refreshed, we'll come and you can come right back in. Just a break! Go and take a break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check with disadvantage, because you didn't even use his name. That I've said twice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Our lord and savior.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20, natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, not bad. Even better. This is what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Deception.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. That's a negative three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A negative three to your deception?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you really should've taken that potion beforehand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The one that you stole from me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a 13. Disadvantage, minus three. I still got pretty good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are four that are here, meditation. One looks like a young man, looking like he might be on hard times and has tear marks on his face where he may have been looking up to the statue and revelling. The four people that were attending see you and, "Oh," and they get up and start gathering their things. The two that work at the temple are confused, look at each other, and look at you, and begin to walk towards you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they carrying weapons of any sort, or vestments or jewels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they're wearing tabards that are mostly a silver-white color with the symbol of Bahamut, the blue with the silver dragon. They're simply dressed. They're the caretakers of the temple, low-level priests of the Platinum Dragon. As they approach, one of them looks to be a mid-30s human male, male-pattern baldness taking a large portion of his shorter, blond hair. The other one appears to be a half-elven man as well. He looks younger, but looks can be deceiving with half-elves. They both approach with a somewhat concerned look and the half-elf speaks up first and goes, "I'm sorry, "you said that the Holy Father needs the room cleared?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I come up from behind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anything around us, like donation jars, or anything around us? I don't know how churches work, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do they have a ticket-taker? 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They may have been things that people left as a gift or an offering. A few copper, one of them could even have a silver. You don't see any other boxes. It looks like they're cleared out fairly frequently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If there's one close to me, I would like to cast Mage Hand and grab it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Triple-checking if Mage Hand has--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sure I will drop my form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Disguise Self remains cast. However, Mage Hand, if I recall, may have--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's an action to make it appear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, but it's verbal and somatic, so as they're approaching, you look back and forth and begin casting a spell. As this is happening, they both go, "Uh--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! I step up from behind Nott. Thank you, dear. My assistant did as I asked. I really needed some quiet time alone in the temple tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wasn't aware you had an assistant?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just hired her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them goes, "Oh, of course, my apologies, Your Grace," and the human leaves. The half-elf still seems dubious. "Your Grace, you seem to be rather weary. Perhaps I should stay and "make sure you need help."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need some quiet time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll be quiet."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no. (coughs) No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think what His Holiness is trying to convey is that he will be going on a spiritual journey, and there's only room on that train for one dude!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scoot on out. Scoot it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, Your Grace." The half-elf leaves, but his eyes don't deviate. He appears to leave the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was perfect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That went really well! Right? Okay. You stand right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to watch the door. They all went out the front door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's open archways that lead down long hallways, and they all appear to have left the hallways.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to Invoke Duplicity. I'm going to make it look like he's kneeling down in the doorway, praying. Then I'm going to run up, and I want to start painting up the Platinum Dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so your Invoke Duplicity's there, and you-- the Platinum Dragon's about 15 feet up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I climb on up! I start painting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to be busting you out of jail.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LIAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using very minute ledges that are carved out of the various temple pillars that hold up and maintain the weight of the beautiful archways that mark the top part of the temple, you tiny rock climb with the finger strength that only Jester has in this whole group setup, and make your way up carefully-- one, two-- leap and then grab onto the Platinum Dragon. It hangs back and forth a bit, and you can now see-- what you can't see from far down is there are two sets of chains that hold it aloft up in the temple. It is free hanging and now you're rocking back and forth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, you know what? I could just knock this down. That could be really good, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be faster. I'm going to hide in one of the pews.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start climbing up and I want to paint it rainbow colors. I feel like that would be a really nice addition for the Platinum Dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You begin painting rainbow colors and pulling out all your various pigments and the platinum begins to give way to a Technicolor vomit nightmare.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With a mustache. And a straw hat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're getting to the mustache, you hear many, many footfalls approaching and a voice saying, "Yeah, just this way, I--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I drop down and run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As he's in the middle of talking, (thud). Make an acrobatics check, because it's a 15-foot drop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow, okay. A three-point landing in the middle. You're still--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm still the dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But there's also the Invoke Duplicity of him there, so there's one, he goes, "That's the--" (thud), "What? Huh?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shrieks) And I run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They give chase. They go, "After whoever that is!" There are now five crownsguard and two members of the House giving chase down one of the hallways.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was there an exit? Looking for an exit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check to look around you, as this is happening rather rapidly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god. I'm going to follow from behind stealthily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're rushing down, you look and there's two open doorways. One of them appears to be a dark interior, the other appears to lead to some sort of candlelight. The hall's coming to an end ahead of you. Right or left, which way are you going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. Say that again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's two open doorways. One is dark on the inside, the other seems to have candlelight from the interior.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you duck into the dark room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is like a Choose Your Own Adventure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. The footfalls are coming faster and faster behind you, and Nott, you're noticing that they're drawing weapons and one of them appears to be pulling out some sort of a bead out of their pocket. That's all you notice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to scream as loud as I can from behind them, and scream: Oh my god, he's dead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, they all immediately stop and look behind at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many are there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's five crownsguard and then two members of the church.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm hiding in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At least four stars on Grand Theft Auto.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You think you may be hidden. They turn and look at you. "What?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He stopped breathing! He's back there, didn't you see him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god. That's a nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they're all looking, the one that had the bead goes-- throws it your direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, dodge it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an 18 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Let me look this up again. I wasn't expecting it to go this way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no save, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to double-check. You make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whew. Thank goodness. I'm wearing my cloak, so I get advantage. That's a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, this sphere of translucent force has completely encapsulated you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're just slowly rolling back, like (rumbling).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, Jester!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of the guards come over to flank it, the other three continue their travel with the two members of the church, so there's five. They then duck into the dark room where you are, as one of them lights a torch to light up the chamber. Now you quickly made your way through, this is a storage chamber, and on the inside you can see there's a bunch of candles, there's a bunch of statues and things that are used in various ceremonies. There's a number of wooden hanging rods, that they place a lot of vestments on that are not used. They're for more formal events and celebrations and holidays. You have put your way into a corner between one of these boxes and some of the raiments in the hope that you won't be seen. They are going to make a very thorough investigation of the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, and when they come in the room--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They begin to slowly look through. One of the members of the church, after the first 30 seconds of not finding anyone, darts off. So there's only four in the chamber, he's going to look elsewhere. The crownsguard begin to peek through, lifting up pieces of equipment, lifting up the tops of storage containers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How big is the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The room's about 15 by ten feet, it's not a very large room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh bejeebies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the way, I only have advantage on stealth, not on saving throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so roll again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So the first roll that I had rolled was a five, which adds up to a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I will take damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You take 5d4 points of force damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five, seven, eight. You take 11 points of force damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Thank you. Thank you, sir! May I have another?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So this is equivalent essentially to an Otiluke's Resilient Sphere. You're in a hamster ball, but the two guards that are right there are flanking it and holding it in place so you can't move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Blink on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uh, I found them!" (whoosh) "Wait. No, she was right-- He was right, I-- Spread out!" And they all begin to scatter out into the hallways now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealthily. If I-- yeah, because I can move like, what, ten feet with Blink? Or can I--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can reappear ten feet away. It's either ten or five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've never used Blink before!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But you have to roll for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. So with Blink, at the start of your next turn, you return within ten feet of where you vanished.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But you've got to roll 11 or higher for you to even blink out in the first place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, jeebies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got it. 11 or higher. No problem.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Goddamnit. Why did you have to say anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, thank you. Keep her honest on that one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the Traveler happy with you yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So your form flickers for a moments as the spell kicks in. However: you vanish, "Spread out!" You're right back in place. "Wait!" and they go ahead--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Charm Person!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast Charm Person? All right, it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At 3rd-level. How many have I used?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus. You're using every spell you have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I am.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to be an expensive problem to solve here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you can target three creatures at 3rd-level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many are in the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three in the room now, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four in the room total.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no. Because there are two guards against him, so there's three after her. Yes, that's crownsguard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then you lost one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then one left so there are four in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There are four in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's three crownsguard and one member of the house. Who do you attack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can kill him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the crownsguard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so they have advantage on this save, because you are technically in opposition on this one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 14. What's the DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, he fails. Other one, two sixes in a row: fail! The third one, two and-- No, they all fail! Even with advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get the fuck out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the three crownsguard come in and are like, "Have you seen where this person went? "Apparently someone's masquerading as you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Been looking everywhere for him. Can't find him anywhere. Maybe check that room with the candles on the other side of the hallway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll go check."

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: That room with the candles!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The three crownsguard turn around and rush off to find it, while the member of the house, the half-elf from earlier, is like, "Nobody? That's-- That's him! Ugh." and is going to rush to try and grab you. Go ahead and roll another d20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just use your handaxe! Oh, wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five. No, it's going to go for a full grapple. It's an athletics check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I-- That's 2nd-level, I can cast it. I cast Hold Person. On them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That is going to be a 16. I believe that's a success. Yeah, 13 plus three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grr. (grumbling) You're weak, I'm strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it does come in and go to grapple you and hold you in place. So you're currently now being held in this form by the entity. You can try and break free by doing an athletics check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try to break free.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, try it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just everybody think back to the stink eye Laura gave us on the hospital run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I know. What do I add to this? What do I add?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your athletics check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My athletics.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to die trying to help her graffiti a statue in a church.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, it's a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12, you are grappled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Goddang it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However go ahead and roll another d20 because your Blink spell is still active.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next round, you appear ten feet from where you were. Where do you want to appear?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Out the doorway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You appear in the doorway. The three guard are in the other chamber, and they are currently-- You can now see into the other room where you didn't run and it looks to be the bedchambers of the actual Kumas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can hear him like, "What's going on? I was trying to sleep." They're like, "Ah, sir, "there's a-- Wait."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take off running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go running down the hallway, at this point--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, would I Blink again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two other crownsguard, who are currently guarding Nott-- you see now Nott is encapsulated in this bubble and is like, "Ah!" and one of them is pulling out chains and cuffs on them, and they're preparing to essentially arrest Nott once this bubble goes away. They both turn around in the middle of this scuffle, and see you running towards them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Charm Person, 2nd-level!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeez Louise!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage, one of them succeeds: two 17's in a row. The other--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. When I Blink though--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one fails, a seven and a one. So one of them just looks at you and smiles. The one holding the chains for Nott. The other one pulls a blade.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk in. Slow down and walk up like: I heard somebody was impersonating me in here. Have you found them yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check with disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm old!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blade is pulled out and goes, "We're sorry, sir. We were called in here. There was "apparently a disturbance and we found this one. We are preparing arrest."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw your other guard friends running that direction. I think the impersonator was back there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, good. Hopefully they'll go ahead and catch them. We have to wait for this one."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I heard them shouting for help, though. They were really shouting. Shouting for a lot of help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one you charmed goes, "Well, I'll go ahead and find out," and then walks over to help them while the one who resisted the charm just sits there and takes the chains from him and is now waiting for Nott to get out. By the way, roll a d20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, here we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten. No, I'm still there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (poof, poof) Don't mind that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Last chance. All alone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other person from the house comes by, the half-elf, and says "You fool! That's the one "that's been--" Now the actual Herald of the House comes out. He's got his pajamas on, and he's like, "What's going-- What's this?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah! How do I get out of this? Can I cast Dispel Magic on Nott's bubble?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a d20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: God, you've cast 19 spells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No I haven't! I've--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Add your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good. Oh my god, that's-- what is that, 23?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check. That was cocked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Acrobatics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? 15. You slip out of it in time. Roll a d20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I might Blink again! Jesus!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys, get out of this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Run! Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven; okay. You guys start bolting. At this point you can hear footsteps coming from the other entrance hall as more folks are coming in to join the chaos, what are you doing? Just full dash?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Full dash. Full dash?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Full dash, yes. Full dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Laura, roll a d20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you are running, Jester disappears.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know where she went!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to run another 15 feet. Does anyone have eyes on me right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone behind you has eyes on you, and you're about to come back into the center of the temple where there are two hallways that exit to the front and the back. The right and the left both exit the temple, but you also hear footsteps coming from somewhere. What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Somewhere in another part of the city entirely, Caleb's going: Oh, that's interesting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will full dash and get out of there, and turn left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's now two crownsguard rushing towards the direction where Nott is, and you see Nott tearing ass away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know in Matrix 2, that overhead shot of all the agents filling into the center? That's what I imagine: waves and waves of agents.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you still look like the lord of the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got one more 2nd-level spell left. I'm going to cast Mirror Image on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Now there are multiple copies of the Herald of the House Kumas. It's an army of old dudes, old dragonborns.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take off running towards wherever the smallest amount of people coming--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be to the right, the opposite direction that Nott went. You charge that direction. You move the rest of your movement that way 30 feet. Roll another d20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm using all my 20s here. 12, shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two steps!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, they all blink out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do my Mirror Images blink out too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they all do, because you're not present.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you've managed to make it out into the street now. You are now out of the temple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to duck behind something and look to see if Jester came out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check to see if you can manage to lose the folks that are chasing you into the street.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That, you have advantage on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're pretty sure they've lost you. They're now starting to scatter and give orders off in different directions. You've caused quite a commotion. Jester, you've returned into place. Your first time using Blink and you're like, "Oh god! "What's happening?!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah! I take off running again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mirror Images going everywhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right. Oh god, but if I get a double dash, I can get farther away, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to try to double dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a full 60 feet of movement as you're rushing down the other hallway. You hear the voices behind you shouting, "There he is! Keep going! How are there so many of him?! What's "going on?!" Roll another d20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, okay. Five. Keep running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You keep running and make your way out now into the night air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I drop Blink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you drop Blink, spell's gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I drop Disguise Self.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards are now rushing up and coming to the edge of the exit and they can see you now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, they can see me? Can I turn a corner and drop Disguise Self?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could try, but they still have eyes trained on you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, I'm not going to drop Disguise Self, then. I'm going to keep going. I want to do it as soon as I'm out of eyeshot for a split second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got to try and find a way to break eye contact with them, but they're pretty trained on you right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Can I Invoke Duplicity? No, I already did it. I get it twice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do get it twice. You get Channel Divinity twice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wait! I have something where I can turn invisible!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just got it! I'm going to use it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they're chasing, you Channel Divinity. You give a silent little whispered prayer to the Traveler to give you the opportunity to escape.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please don't fuck me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You vanish. You are invisible for the next six seconds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run as fast as I can and turn a corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In that moment, make a stealth check with advantage, because you're invisible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the voices of the crownsguard going on like, "What--where-- Spread out! Where did you "see them go?" "I didn't see. They just vanished!" "This is ridiculous. We're all going to get into "serious trouble if we don't find them." They all begin to scatter about, and you begin to weave your way through some of the nearby alleyways into the shadows of the night. Yeah, that invisibility completely cut off their eyeline to keep following you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got any spell slots left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do. I'm going to change Disguise Self and make myself look like a little beggar human girl, and I'm going to walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, you manage to slowly blend back into the night chaos.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is easily the most fucked two characters have ever been, to a full reversal! That is the deepest fuckage we've ever dipped a toe in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not since Scanbo, I think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth getting arrested, I don't give a shit. You guys were fucked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I probably should have stayed up on the dragon there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is also the most exciting night Kumas has had in ten years.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah! I'll say that, within the next couple of days, word has gotten around the city of Zadash, to the point where some of the town criers are talking about, "Terrible vandalism! Platinum "Dragon nearly ruined by upstarts and secret cabal of anti-religious hate!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Secret cabal, because there are so many of them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As your evening comes to a close and you go back to The Leaky Tap to go for a rest, you have a moment to yourself to think and have a moment to breathe and gain a little bit of calm. You sense a presence. Sitting on the bed next to you, you see the familiar dark green cloak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi. Did you see what I did?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you like me again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was never disappointed in the first place, Jester." The hood still obscuring most of the face, just the lower jaw and mouth visible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why didn't you come?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't see you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You don't need to see me to know that I'm with you. And you're free now."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. You promise you won't leave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As long as you continue to be that wonderful little seed of joy and chaos in the "world, I'll be walking behind you the entire time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If things had gotten really bad, though, you would have stepped in, right? You wouldn't have let something really bad happen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not within my power, no."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do appreciate your artwork."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he looks better now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tell them of what we have accomplished. We want "more friends, don't we?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So many.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you think I could have a look at that strange relic?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which one? We found a lot of relics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The one that you procured from that Xhorhasian warrior."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, the box? Yeah, of course. I dig into the haversack and show it to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He extends his hand and takes it and looks to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you think it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Curious, indeed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He said something about having babies or something with it. I can't remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't think I've ever come across magic like that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of magic is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I've not come across it before. I'm interested, definitely. Be careful "with that. Things that are unknown are notably able to draw dangerous and inquiring eyes and minds."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I should keep it hidden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think you should."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll keep it in this pink bag. It's very discreet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are more like you out there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw a couple medallions for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I am worth worshipping, after all."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obviously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But you are my favorite."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was going to ask if I was!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hope that maybe you could all meet someday."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would love that. I, of course, will be the leader of your worship, obviously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps sometime next year. For the day of the Zenith in Undillar. Yes, I think that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm writing it in my sketchbook. Will you tell them? And then I'll meet them there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They all speak to me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Wow. Thanks, thank you. Thank you, Traveler.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hand reaches out and touches yours. You can feel the contact, but it's strangely cold. You blink, and the Traveler's gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sighs) I draw so many things in my sketchbook. All of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, now I've got to go feed the baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Now, let's take a break. I didn't realize the time had gone by quite so far. My apologies, people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's almost like a game of D&D.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The winner is Mellydew. Congratulations. We'll get your info and get this sent out to you ASAP, so thank you for being a part. Laura will be joining us shortly; she's finishing feeding the baby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, feed the baby, give it life.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Feed me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It works out okay. Having all spent the majority of these two weeks handling your business, wandering through Zadash and beyond, returning, what do you wish to do? You guys have regathered in the Leaky Tap.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (groaning) I'm going to pretend to be a small, old platinum dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's out, get him!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Kumas) I want rice pudding!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An uneventful two weeks for everyone, I assume?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not much happened.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nah, not a lot to report.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got a lot of reading done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's good. New books?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the beauty of a library.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Beau, you look like you got a couple new little marks and stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Just, you know, I think I can punch ghosts now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A lot of ghosts need punching?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you ever met a ghost that doesn't need punching?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this a realization that you had?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I never even met a ghost. How would you punch it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just know if I saw a ghost, I would want to punch it. Ghosts are scary.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How was your--?

lines.name: SAM
