lines.text: I did a lot of drinking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep. Just drinking and thinking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were off on your own. Are you okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, a little bit. You know, it's easier to steal things when you can pay for them with money.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How was your time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. I've met a ghost that I didn't want to punch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have met a ghost you didn't want to punch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I thought of one. Oh, what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you met more than one ghost before?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you didn't get to see where we found this guy. It was definitely a cemetery. He was living in the middle of a cemetery.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't have to tell me any more, it's fine. I'll just imagine the worst possible--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's where the temple is, in the middle of the cemetery. Actually, technically it's not a cemetery. It's a graveyard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, there's a difference?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Graveyard has an attached temple, cemetery is just by itself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did not know that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I know a couple things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a request. Upon further inspection of this here letter, Quen'pillar is the month that we're in, which we all know, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it Quen'pillar already?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is. How time flies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're going to start putting up Winter Crest decorations in the stores. We have to start thinking about what we're going to get each other.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two weeks earlier every year.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While I have no idea who Marius LePual or Evantica or any of this is, this was supposed to be delivered by the end of this month to the Wayfarer's Cove.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the Wayfarer's Cove?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's back in-- help me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Menagerie Coast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Menagerie Coast. Where Jester and I are from.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it an actual cove?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you been there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have. Nicodranas is where Jester's from, I'm from Port Damali.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you don't know any of these people?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't. I don't?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You talking about making a trip? Taking off?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was thinking about it. I journeyed a little further south. I'm actually looking for someone and I had been meaning to head back that way, anyway. If this is taking us in that direction, if it'll teach us anything more about the, you know, (grunting).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Looks a lot like what sucked into your body. That was a weird night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, it was.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that like a peach pit or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An abused cantaloupe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that'll happen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An angry marble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know why that's somehow weirder than abused cantaloupe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get the picture.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Either way, I don't feel very comfortable with it residing in my person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you feel, actually? Do you feel it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, I just feel like me. It was the vision that came with it that fucked me up a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you have any more visions when you were captured?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, but I just kept replaying it over and over. It was dark for so long, and there was nothing really to distract you. I just kept seeing his face, and him holding the orb and pushing it into his, or my chest, and the body on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not having visions right now, so I'm happy to follow another one. This is not where I'm supposed to be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Caduceus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does he say stuff like that a lot?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm happy to entertain your desire to go find out more about this ball inside of you, but there's other things we might want to do, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, you have things that you wanted to accomplish to the north, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, no. No, I have no specific destination in mind. I'm happy to accompany you if the group sees fit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you ever been to the Menagerie Coast? How far south have you been?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I have never been out of the Empire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, me neither.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's warmer, and there's certainly less snow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a plus, you guys! Going in the wintertime kind of sucks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm already sold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus, further away from the frontlines in this war.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? I'll go where you go, Caleb. I worry about a couple things. Yasha said she'd come back when she was ready, and if we're not here, then I don't know how she'll find us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like her and Molly always had a connection. She always knew how to find us because she knew how to find Molly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could leave word, I suppose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't Jester send messages?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Finding Molly's all about who you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, Jester could send her a message.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your past self isn't allowed to laugh at current things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm having a weird-- yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No reactions from Molly here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you drinking from a Caduceus mug?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe, you don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love that. That's amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who are you drinking?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shouting) Who are you drinking?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we could send Yasha a message, that would be better.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I previously wanted to go north to the Soltryce Academy, but I feel like that's another step in the direction that's not pressing for right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus, it sounds like, gauging by this letter, someone's going to catch up with us sooner or later looking for whatever's inside of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. There's no telling that they're going to share any information with me, anyway. I'm fucking absorbing things and shit just appears and I'm getting stronger by the day and it has nothing to do with the things that I'm learning. There's no books or knowledge, it's just happening. What if they look at me like you guys look at me sometimes? What if they don't let me go? Maybe that's not where I need to be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How we look at you sometimes? Like you're awesome? Like we're awestruck?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like weird shit is happening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's accurate, yeah, I do look at you like that sometimes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And not very explained at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's hard when you're the only one experiencing it. It's hard to relay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, what if you tried?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm certainly open to that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How about right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you want to know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any of this that you have not shared yet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gone through. Torn through. There was a local butcher next door that I walked into, and he had said that he was glad to see at least one other of us, that no one else had returned. I said: Who was the other one? He had said Sabian. So I feel like he somehow survived. He knows what happened, why it happened. I can't bear the thought of something happening to me because I'm pursuing this. And I summon the sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see as the blade now is this unique merger of the falchion shape and size, but now holds this golden tint of the Summer's Dance. It curves towards the edge and has a slight pointed jagged arch in the back that the scimitar had previously held. But still contains the barnacle-encrusted pattern across the hilt and there in the center still is the central yellow gleaming eye.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want to be focused on this. I want to be focused on that. Plus, I feel like if those events led to this, maybe there's a remedy for the whole thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you want to find Sabian and hope that he has the answers?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or just kill him. That'd be fine. But yeah, maybe some answers first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you're sure this motherfucker was, like, sole sabotager?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's when the explosion hit. It ripped into my back. It threw me over, and I remember going underwater and seeing parts of the ship fall, and flames above the water. I could see things falling, and some of it was cargo, and some of it looked like me. I just feel like he was prepared to get the hell out of Dodge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just so I'm clear, as I really feel like I'm playing catch up, he's the one responsible for that, er, pearl that you've got in you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was an exacting man. Firm, but fair, and it just leaves more questions than I have answers to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, no offense or anything, but these sound like some crazy-ass fucking sailors.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You speak of a remedy. How do you mean? Do you mean you would rid yourself of that blade, these changes in you? Or am I not hitting it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was not a proponent of change. It's selfish, but I feel like I can do things now. I don't know if I would get rid of it, but I want to know what happened to him. I owe him that much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, good morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, it was a long night. What are you guys talking about?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Our next destination.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord's angry marble in his chest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I was thinking that if you wouldn't be opposed, we could go back to the Menagerie Coast, stop by your mom's place in Nicodranas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I mean, I would have to like disguise myself, but yeah. We could probably go there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Disguise yourself?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I can't go back home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But if you want to go to the Menagerie Coast, you know I'm always on board for that, Fjord. But what about the Academy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I was telling them I feel like instruction isn't exactly what I need; it's not going to get me anything, yet. I just feel like I need to take steps in the right direction, does that make sense? Feels like I'm stalling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also the deal with his little--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the letter does say the Wayfarer's Cove and it says it's supposed to be delivered by the end of this month, so I feel like there's some urgency if we're going to capitalize on intercepting this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For what it's worth, Fjord, Soltryce Academy normally starts with younger students. Not exclusively, but generally.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I hadn't realized. What if you show up with inherent abilities?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, you don't want to give-- (sighs) I think, whatever gifts you've been given, they're natural and progressive. I mean, figure that out on your own first. You don't want to give them back, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, certainly not yet. If it will help me find that fuck, then I'd prefer to hold onto them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're called gifts for a reason, right? It'd be rude to give them back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know how I'd give it back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like that, that's really good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you have to poop it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, like passing a stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Poop it out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It would really hurt, but it could happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could go through his pee-pee hole too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kidney stones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You never know. Maybe somebody else has already done what you did and they already pooped it out, and now it's in you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then I ate the poop stone. Yep. Didn't wash it off or nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was underwater, though, so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true. That is true. That's probably why it was underwater.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're all agreed, then, that Fjord eats poop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's what would have happened if it actually came out of your pee-hole.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) I poop out my pee-hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Menagerie Coast, then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would hate to go without all of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We stick together.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: After what we have been through in the last month, it'd seem foolish to split up now. I'm curious about the Menagerie Coast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) You guys could meet my mom!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm excited.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I so want to meet your mom.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just to be clear, we can meet your mom, but you can't?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can meet her; I can see her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're just not supposed to be seen coming back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She would be okay with you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will let her know to expect us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, speaking of-- Before you came down--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to need you to send a message to Yasha. Do you need to know where she is to send that message?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope, I just need to know it's her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It might be good to let her know where we're going, in case she wants to find us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I send a message to Yasha. Hello, Yasha. I'm really sorry that the last time we left, it was really hard for all of us, but we wanted to let you know that we are probably--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (clicks)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No destination.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I send another message to Yasha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The next day?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I've got three-- four 3rd-level spots, I think. Four, because of my pearl. So I'm going to send another one: Sorry, I got cut off earlier. Anyway, what I was saying is that we are leaving Zadash, and we're on our way out, over the hills, and we're going to go to probably--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (clicks)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best use of Sending ever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven spell slots later.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Jester) Okay, I'm starting at the top again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, have you guys decided to start making your way to the Menagerie Coast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I got to get my handaxe first, so I pick that up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, easy enough. Pumat's there. "Yeah, we worked real hard on this one, so I hope you enjoy "what we've imbued into this previously-not-very-interesting weapon to make it "just a whole lot more interesting."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is so interesting now. Did you want to put a ribbon on it or something to make it prettier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you want to request a ribbon? We've got multiple colors."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) What colors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Green and gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's multiple.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: It is!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "By definition, respectfully, not an incorrect statement."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do-- Let's do green.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That way it matches my cape.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does this little nice bow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really pretty, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, quite literally, the very least I can do."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a plus one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hit and damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus one handaxe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus one handaxe, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No worries.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we set out, I'm going to pull Caleb aside, and-- A moment, Caleb? Are you sure you want to go down to the coast? There's stuff for you to do up north where you were from before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is dangerous there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course, but we'll have to do it at some point. We're all together now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I won't lie, I'm sort of-- Now that we're all together again, I wouldn't mind swinging by my old stomping grounds either.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's the map? Is that on the way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's on the way. Well, it's on a way north, if we wanted to go that way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's to the north, it's not towards the Menagerie Coast?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's more east.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's the map?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's east, it's due east. It's definitely not west. We're here. It's due east, but the coast is down here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be a detour.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you really wanted to, we could PCH this and basically hit the coast and then take that really annoyingly long drive from San Francisco-- but it's so pretty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go, there it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Thanks, Max.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to propose it to the group? I'm happy to go, of course.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can wait. I don't mind waiting. I don't have a specific--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're from Deastok?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, Felderwin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the time limit on that? It's the end of the month, right, on the delivery. And we're at the beginning of this month, or the middle--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beginning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll be back this way again soon. We'll have to come through Zadash, and we can--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if that is the next place we go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott, it looks like the main road goes through Felderwin anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, the main road away from the Menagerie Coast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but-- yep, you're right. Maybe that's-- that's a river. That's not a road.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a big-ass road.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a real big--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can see that and mountains.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So much water on this road!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before we leave, can I stop by the Pillow Trove and let them know any mail coming for me or Ms. Lavorre, Esquire, please forward that to the Menagerie Coast by way of Nicodranas and my mom's place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The Ruby of the Sea has been placed in as your forwarding service.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell you what: after the coast, we will propose it to the group. If they don't want to go, I will go with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. You're more powerful now, aren't you? I saw you got a bunch of paper.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got that paper!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eh. I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you've been doing new spells and things. It's pretty--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go ahead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's pretty incredible. Have you been able to do anything that you've wanted to-- Been studying? Like some special, spectacular spells that can--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I've expanded my repertoire. I have a few new tricks that I will hold onto for the right moment. Are you okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think so! I think I'm okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You seem a little restless to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ever since Molly fell, I've just been-- there's a bit of a sense of urgency, you know? We have things that we need to do and we don't have forever to do them. I want to keep you on your path and I want to keep on my path as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm working on mine. Mine is a little long-goal, perhaps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it you're working on? Just learning new magic?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what I've done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, but I don't know how you're going to undo it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I don't have one plan in mind. Part of me thinks that I should just stop it from happening to anyone else. Part of me is very selfish and wants to carve it out of my past.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not selfish, that's important.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's dangerous, not just to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, I think I understand a little about that, too. There's things that I want to change as well. Things that would be risky to change. But sometimes you have to take a big risk, if it's that important.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is true. You are my greatest friend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Little ol' me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Even if there is some risk. Because if it's really important, it's worth the risk, ja?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You and I, we have an agreement. A pact.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever you need, we are going to make it happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Even if it's risky, yes. We're going to do it. You'll help me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No matter what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If it is in my power, I will do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good. Well then, onward to the beach!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's funny. I've never been to the beach.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! I bet you would sunburn easily. You should probably coat yourself with a layer of dirt, just to make sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Done and done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Were you just thinking about that? Don't think I wasn't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry. I'll buy you another one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you've reconvened, are there any last materials you need to pick up for the journey, or are you ready to move?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to buy Cad a hat. A straw hat, to replace the one I stole from him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Caduceus' hat replaced.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also going to distribute-- I made everybody a potion of healing, so everybody gets--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You made that?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I made them myself. They've got a bit of a weird flavor, but they're--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Cad in the Hat delivers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What level are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Basic: level one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But still.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus can now--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You basic!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus can make one healing potion for 25 gold and one day of downtime.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a nice little pick-me-up if anyone goes down next to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I had that as Keyleth at later levels; I never fucking used it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, thanks Keyleth.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: #ThanksKeyleth

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She had better options by then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kiki had other things going on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got super busy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could go anywhere on the planet at any time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, don't miss those days.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a bad thing to have at later levels; it was better at lower levels.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boosh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like, "Oh, you can teleport anywhere? Cool, let me just prepare the world every week." Don't miss that at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, we want to go to Brazil-- No, Norway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Goddamn it, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather your supplies, finish your business here for the time being. You gather up your new cart that you brought down from Shadycreek Run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey! Invisi-cart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Invisi-cart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And your horses, which are two that pull the cart, and you have--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dancing Queen and Mamma Mia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, you have your two horses and the cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we need more for the journey, or is that enough?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Didn't we have a couple more, too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we set them free.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's enough. So your two horses and your cart. You leave the southern gates of Zadash, making your way southward, retracing your steps down through Alfield and Trostenwald, to eventually make your way through the Wuyun Gorge, the Wuyun Gates, where you two first began this journey in session zero, and southward to the Menagerie Coast beyond. And that's where we'll finish tonight's episode, we'll pick up with that next week. This is going to be a whole different flavor, I'm excited.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, shit. All right! We'll pick up for that next week. As a reminder, the week after that, Marisha, myself, and Taliesin will be out in the thing in the desert.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unavailable, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unavailable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Indisposed!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just preparing you guys for that. There will be a week off from the main story. We'll be back next week to see this next leg of the journey and see where it takes us. In the interim, thank you again, D&D Beyond. Thank you guys for coming along with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) D&D Beyond!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. We're done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Make love to me tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
